001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializerProvider;
007import org.bitcoinj.crypto.ECKey;
008
009import java.io.IOException;
010
011/**
012 * Serialize (without private key)
013 */
014public class ECKeySerializer extends JsonSerializer<ECKey> {
015    @Override
016    public void serialize(ECKey value, JsonGenerator gen, SerializerProvider serializers) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
017        gen.writeString(value.getPublicKeyAsHex());
018    }
019}
